name: Royal Indian Girl Wedding
description:
Every Girls want to look beautiful with stylist fashion on her wedding! every Indian princess doll want to look like bridal gopi girls in her own Indian wedding games. Grand wedding of bride and groom celebrity with Indian tradition girl makeover. And every girl wants to become Indian bridle princess. In this Game, First of all, clear out her face in spa. Then help this princess girl in makeover to becoming Indian fashion stylist model and make her look gorgeous with new fashion trends in royal indian wedding rituals and makeover. Every girl wants to look amazing in wedding. Create your own ethnic style with this exclusive rural Indian makeover which is every girl's dream. We have provided all in one wedding package like punjabi wedding, from spa, dress-up, make up to date with variety of mehndi designs to amazing ornaments to beautiful Indian sarees and choli as a outfits. Get ready for this theme of indian designer bride fashion salon for wedding! After wedding, every girls wants to look pretty so for have beautiful look be ready in indian bhabhi makeup salon. Have fun playing this most religious Indian arranged marriage makeover salon game. And enjoy Indian celebrity royal wedding.

- Spa with number of tools and masks for a glowing skin.
